headline: Citizens Bank, N.A. Announces Redemption of Senior Notes
summary: PROVIDENCE, R.I., November 17, 2025--Citizens Bank, N.A. today announced the redemption on November 28, 2025 (the "Redemption Date") all of its outstanding $500,000,000 aggregate principal amount 3.750% Senior Notes due February 18, 2026 (CUSIP No. 17401QAU5) (the "Notes"). The redemption price for the Notes will be equal to 100% of principal amount of the Notes redeemed, plus any accrued and unpaid interest thereon to, but excluding, the Redemption Date.
